A norm of reported hours for a full-time employee is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8 hours per day or 40 hours per week.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Log in to the system\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Open the link: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://time.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".
